metadata.Title: CVE-2019-13220 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Use of uninitialized stack variables in the start_decoder function in stb_vorbis through 2019-03-04 allows an attacker to cause a denial of service or disclose sensitive information by opening a crafted Ogg Vorbis file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-13220` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libstb0 - 0.0~git20190817.1.052dce1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libstb package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.0~git20190817.1.052dce1-1').
